headline: Tracking Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's Q4 2024 portfolio shifts include a new stake in Constellation Brands, notable disposals, and increased stakes in key companies. See more.
